The release of Gutsy Gibbon 7.10 is just around the corner in October and it's already time to prepare.  Discussion is taking place on the events of the release party on <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=544297:the|MissouriTeam forums]]</nowiki>.

== Who ==
Anyone and everyone is welcome to join us.

== Where ==
The main presence will be in IRC, however, local user groups may be involved in the release.  If your group will be involved, please make sure to update the Wiki with your groups information
